Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கண்ணுடையர் என்பவர் கற்றோர் முகத்திரண்டு புண்ணுடையர் கல்லா தவர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Men who learning gain have eyes, men say; Blockheads' faces pairs of sores display.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A stark visual contrast between two figures. On the left stands a learned person ('கற்றோர்'). Their eyes are bright, clear, and radiate a gentle light of wisdom, allowing them to see the world in vibrant color and detail.
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right stands an unlearned person ('கல்லாதவர்'). Where their eyes should be, there are two ugly, raw sores ('புண்'), and their perception of the world is grey, blurry, and indistinct.
Layered_Composition.Background: The background behind the learned person is a rich, detailed, and beautiful landscape. The background behind the unlearned person is a desolate, monochrome, and out-of-focus wasteland.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A powerful and literal depiction of the idea that the learned possess true eyes, while the unlearned have but two sores on their face, blind to the richness of the world.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The radiant eyes of the learned versus the sores of the unlearned is the central, shocking metaphor. The contrast in the perceived worlds behind them reinforces the theme.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Stark, confronting, profound, emphasizing the tragedy of ignorance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The learned person's side is full of vibrant color and bright, clear light. The unlearned person's side is desaturated, grey, and dimly lit.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A side-by-side portrait shot, forcing the viewer to compare the two figures directly.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with graphic detail on the sores to create a strong impact.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast split lighting. The learned person is lit beautifully, while the unlearned is lit harshly.

Cultural_Anchors: The value of education as true perception.

Negative_Prompt: unlearned person with normal eyes, learned person with sores, blurry figures, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations in the texture and color of the two backgrounds.
